data.name: UsageHeader
UsageBody
data.value:
Usage: nxslt source stylesheet [options] [param=value...] [xmlns:prefix=uri...]
Options: -? Show this message -o filename Write output to named file -xw Strip non-significant whitespace from source and stylesheet -xe Do not resolve external definitions during parse phase -xi Do not process XInclude during parse phase -v Validate documents during parse phase -t Show load and transformation timings -xs No source XML -pp Pretty-print source document -pi Get stylesheet URL from xml-stylesheet PI in source document -r Use named URI resolver class -af Assembly file name to look up URI resolver class -an Assembly full or partial name to look up URI resolver class -mo Allow multiple output documents -ext Comma-separated list of extension object class names -xmlc creds Credentials in username:password@domain format to be used in Web request authentications when loading source XML -xslc creds Credentials in username:password@domain format to be used in Web request authentications when loading XSLT - Dash used as source argument loads XML from stdin - Dash used as stylesheet argument loads XSLT from stdin

data.name: ErrorCommandLineParsing
data.value: An error occurred while parsing command line.

data.name: ErrorMissingSource
data.value: Missing source filename.

data.name: ErrorMissingStylesheet
data.value: Missing stylesheet filename.

data.name: ErrorParsingDoc
data.value: An error occurred while parsing document: {0}: {1}

data.name: ErrorMissingOutFileName
data.value: Missing output filename after '-o' option.

data.name: ErrorCreatingFile
data.value: An error occurred while creating file '{0}'.

data.name: ErrorUnboundedPrefix
data.value: Prefix '{0}' cannot be resolved. Use xmlns:{0}='...' to bind '{0}' to a URI.

data.name: ErrorWrongParam
data.value: Parameter name '{0}' must be followed by an '=' character.

data.name: ErrorBothStdin
data.value: The input and the stylesheet document cannot both be read from stdin. At least one of them must be loaded from a URL.

data.name: ErrorUnrecognizedOption
data.value: Unrecognized option : '{0}'.

data.name: FromStdin
data.value: <from stdin>

data.name: ErrorInvalidPI
data.value: The source document does not contain an 'xml-stylesheet' processing instruction of this form: <?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href='stylesheet-url'?>

data.name: ErrorBothStylesheetAndPI
data.value: The '-pi' option cannot be used when the stylesheet argument is specified.

data.name: ErrorBothNoSourceAndPI
data.value: The '-pi' and '-xs' options are mutually exclusive.

data.name: ErrorBothNoSourceAndSource
data.value: The '-xs' option and source document filename (or '-') are mutually exclusive.

data.name: Timings
data.value: Stylesheet load/compile time: {0, 9:f3} milliseconds Transformation time: {1, 9:f3} milliseconds Total execution time: {2, 9:f3} milliseconds

data.name: ErrorTransform
data.value: An error occurred while executing transformation: {0}

data.name: ErrorMissingName
data.value: The '=' character must be preceded by the name of a parameter or a namespace declaration.

data.name: ErrorMissingValue
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is missing a value following the '=' character.

data.name: ErrorMissingURI
data.value: Namespace declaration '{0}' is missing a URI following the '=' character.

data.name: ErrorCompileStyle
data.value: An error occurred while compiling stylesheet '{0}': {1}

data.name: ErrorPIStylesheetNotFound
data.value: Stylesheet '{0}', defined in 'xml-stylesheet' processing instruction not found.

data.name: ErrorMissingResolverTypeName
data.value: Missing URI resolver type name after '-r' option.

data.name: ErrorMissingAssemblyFileName
data.value: Missing assembly file name after '-af' option.

data.name: ErrorMissingExtClassNames
data.value: Missing list of extension class names after '-ext' option.

data.name: ErrorMissingAssemblyName
data.value: Missing assembly name after '-an' option.

data.name: ErrorLoadAssembly
data.value: An error occurred while loading assembly '{0}'.

data.name: ErrorGetTypeFromAssembly
data.value: Type '{0}' not found in '{1}' assembly.

data.name: ErrorCreateResolver
data.value: An error occurred while instantiating '{0}' type: {1}

data.name: ErrorTypeNotXmlResolver
data.value: Specified URI resolver type '{0}' is not XmlResolver type.

data.name: ErrorGetType
data.value: Type '{0}' not found.

data.name: ErrorBothAssemblyFileNameAndName
data.value: -af and -an options cannot be used simultaneously.

data.name: ErrorExtNamespaceClash
data.value: Two extension objects cannot be bound to '{0}' namespace URI.

data.name: ErrorExtNoNamespace
data.value: Extension object '{0}' must be bound to a namespace URI.

data.name: ErrorMissingExsltLibPath
data.value: Missing EXSLT.NET assembly file path after '-exslt' option.

data.name: ErrorLoadExsltLibNotFound
data.value: An error occurred while loading specified EXSLT.NET assembly '{0}'. Error details: {1}

data.name: ErrorLoadExsltTransformTypeNotFound
data.value: Specified EXSLT.NET assembly '{0}' doesn't contain GotDotNet.Exslt.ExsltTransform class. Error details: {1}

data.name: ErrorLoadExsltTransformTypeCannotBeInstantiated
data.value: GotDotNet.Exslt.ExsltTransform class from specified EXSLT.NET assembly '{0}' cannot be instantiated. Error details: {1}

data.name: ErrorMissingXMLCredentials
data.value: Missing credentials after '-xmlc' option.

data.name: ErrorMissingXSLTCredentials
data.value: Missing credentials after '-xslc' option.

data.name: PatternCredentials
data.value: (?<username>\w+):?(?<psw>\w*)@?(?<domain>\w*)

data.name: ErrorBadCredentials
data.value: Specified credentials '{0}' don't match username:password@domain pattern.

data.name: ErrorDuplicateCredentials
data.value: Duplicate credentials.

data.name: ErrorStylesheetAndPrettyPrintMode
data.value: No stylesheet (in file name, '-' or '-pi' ways) should be specified along with '-pp' option.

data.name: IdentityTransformation
data.value: <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="."/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>

data.name: Error
data.value: An error occured: {0}
